title: Strengthening Hospitality Competencies: Middle School Statistics through Historical Context: Rediscovering the Mean

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the developmental process of measures of central tendency (median, mode, arithmetic mean) through historical cases.
Learners can demonstrate data estimation and average calculation processes using visual tools (e.g., bar graphs).
Learners can compare and explain appropriate application cases of median, mode, and arithmetic mean in statistical reasoning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
